summary: In Weimar-era Berlin, an aspiring writer strikes up a friendship with a vivacious, penniless singer.
cast: Julie Harris|Laurence Harvey|Shelley Winters|Ron Randell|Lea Seidl|Anton Diffring|Ina De La Haye|Jean Gargoet|Stanley Maxted|Alexis Bobrinskoy|André Mikhelson|Frederick Valk|Tutte Lemkow|Patrick McGoohan|Julia Arnall|Zoe Newton|David Kossoff|Paddy Smith|Bill Brandon|Ann Elsden|Stanley Morrell|Bill Billington|Anita Douglas|Charles Saynor|Harry Purvis|Geoffrey Dunn|Peter Prowse|Stan Bernard|Harold Siddons|Philip Morant|William Adams|Charles Andre|Jack Arrow|Anthony Bryant|Janet Coats|Lynn Courtney|Jacqueline Cox|Vincent Edward|George Eugeniou|Victor Fairley|Janice Field|Rodney Goodall|Mandy Harper|Jack Healy|Jan Holden|Don Koll|Janet May|Charles McDaniel|Charles Mosconi|Arthur Mullard|Carol Olver|Clifford A. Pellow|Sid Raymond|George Ricarde|Barry Shawzin|Frank Singuineau|Keith Smith|Emile Stemmler|Gareth Tandy|Stan Tracey|Richard Wattis|Angela White
title: Soy una cámara
